nodes.text: The odupiendo were a species of large, flightless avians from Naboo. Although unable to fly, the odupiendo were fast runners. Taking advantage of that particular skill, a sport called odupiendo-racing was created, which involved several of those avian creatures running along a circular track. It was one of the betting sports at the Outlander Club on Coruscant.
Bodhi Rook, an Imperial cargo pilot, bet on odupiendo races on Jedha.
